#summary The Central Data Structure

= Contents =
  * {{{private Stack<Image> _Images}}} - A Stack of images to be used by the [VoodooAlgorithm ], produced by the LocalBrain
  * {{{private FloorPlan _FloorPlan}}}  - a [FloorPlanProcessing FloorPlan] object, constructed with an image, which will store a {{{FloorPlanTile[][]}}}
  * {{{private Queue<MoveCommand> _Moves}}} - A Queue of moves, produced by [PathFinding PathFinder] and used by LocalBrain
  * {{{private Position _Position}}} - A Position Object, representing the Robot's current position, produced by [VoodooAlgorithm] and used by [PathFinding PathFinder]
